name: PRO100 3D Interior Catalog Element
summary: A MEB file is a catalog element used by Ecru Software PRO100, a 3D interior and furniture design application developed by Ecru Software. It contains a single design component, such as a cabinet, shelf, or appliance, that users can import into PRO100 and place within a larger interior layout. MEB files store reusable furniture items or decorative elements, allowing designers to drag and drop into a room design.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
